channel.title: web_proxy on Ain't a creature shitting out of mouth

item.title: Web Proxies
item.description: =========== Tip: common to burp suite, mitmproxy, and proxify When a DVWM instance is running on a local machine and accessed by 127.0.0.1:PORT, local proxy cannot intercept HTTP request correctly. After a series of trial and error, the solution found was accessing the instance using a name, like: add a line to the hosts file: 127.0.0.1 DVWA visit DVWA:PORT instead of 127.0.0.1:PORT ================= mitmproxy install KALI: mitmproxy is already installed on Kali.
